actions.committee: House Committee on Banking, Finance and Urban Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking, Finance and Urban Affairs.

committees.committee: House Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to amend the Export-Import Bank Act of 1945 to reestablish government-to-government relations and provide for the defense of the Republic of China (Taiwan).

summary.text: Amends the Export-Import Bank Act of 1945 to prohibit the President from determining that export credits or guarantees may be extended to the People's Republic of China until: (1) government-to-government relations are reestablished between the United States and Taiwan; and (2) the United States retains standing to defend Taiwan.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Export-Import Bank Act of 1945 to reestablish government-to-government relations and provide for the defense of the Republic of China (Taiwan).
